title: Flamingals Women's Bootcut Jeans Ripped Mid Rise Stretchy Tummy Control Cut Out Raw Hem Denim Jeans
description: Features:Mid waist strechy bootcut jeans with wash detailed. Wash detail contribute to the overall design of garments; Raw hem provides a clean and delicate finish and adds a subtle and polished detail to the garment; Denim material makes it look vintage and easy on the eyes; These versatile capri jeans are perfect for casual wear, offering both style and comfort for casual days out

Material: Made from carefully chosen super stretch fabric to ensure our customers feel comfortable in all positions, whether sitting or squatting. The soft, lightweight, and breathable fabric reduces any sense of restriction

Occasion: This garment is remarkably versatile and can be worn on a variety of occasions. Whether you're attending a casual get-together, or getting involved in outdoor activities, this piece is the perfect choice. Additionally, it's an excellent option for students, working professionals, and anyone who wants to look stylish and feel comfortable

Jeans are a versatile choice, especially to show your style.The jeans characterized by its relaxed, laid-back, and eclectic vibe, allows you to embrace your inner free spirit and create a personalized and effortlessly chic ensemble

Please refer to size measurement in the last item picture before ordering. As outfits fit experts, our sizing is based on a true-to-size fit. Since the fabric is super stretchy, we recommend you follow the exact size that fits you in the table
